text: James Francis Ivory (born June 7, 1928) is an American movie director, producer, and screenwriter. For his work on Call Me by Your Name (2017), Ivory won awards from the Academy Awards, British Academy of Film and Television Arts, Writers Guild of America, the Critics' Choice Awards and the Scripter Awards, among others.
